summary: Email correspondence regarding the handling of document processing in US v. Epstein case. The email discusses returning DVDs containing case data and reviewing vendor work product before uploading to Relativity, a document review platform.

persons.name: Andy Hamilton
persons.context: Person designated to receive DVDs for case file storage as mentioned in the email.

events.title: Email exchange about case data processing
events.description: Email correspondence discussing the completion of document unitization and coding from 56 DVD files in the US v. Epstein case, and arrangements for returning DVDs and reviewing vendor work.

keyFacts: The document references 'US v. Epstein' case and processing of data from 56 DVD files.
A vendor completed document unitization and coding of the data from the DVDs.
The email discusses logistical arrangements for returning physical DVDs and reviewing vendor work before uploading to Relativity document review platform.
